points.label: Fore Mast
points.description: The fore mast is the frontmost mast on a ship, used for carrying sails and rigging.

points.label: Keel
points.description: The keel is the structural backbone of a ship, running along the bottom and providing stability.

points.label: Bridge
points.description: The bridge is the command center of a ship, where navigation and operations are controlled.

points.label: Rudder
points.description: The rudder is a flat piece of wood or metal at the stern of a ship, used for steering.
